E'b:
E’b. can be distinguished by several features: there are no jewels in the crown, there is a single band around the center of the crosier, and it contains the initial ‘B’ within the shield.

This watermark can be found on the following prints:

  • Self-Portrait (?) with Plumed Cap and Lowered Saber, 1634, Herbert F. Johnson Museum of Art, Ithaca (2016.039.001)

(Erik Hinterding, Rembrandt as an Etcher, 2006, II, 63)
